name: Rogue Station
description:
In Rogue Station, you are put in charge of a remote mining station. Pick a crew, build and expand your station. Numerous enemies lurk in deep space and, with a distant civil war raging, conflict is never far.

Key features:

  • Strategic Gameplay - Target the enemy weak points, manage your crew, juggle power.

  • Build a formidable station - Expand your little outpost and build up weapons and defences.

  • Unique paths - Collect perks as you defeat enemies and build a powerful station.

  • Gain unique powers - Collect perks as you defeat enemies and build a powerful station.

  • Select and grow your crew - Recruit and manage a scrappy crew to man your station.

  • Manage resources - Mine the nearby asteroids to gather more resources. Build bigger weapons and upgrade your systems.

  • Meet the locals - Nearby colonies, mercenary agencies and travelling traders to meet and grow closer to or to exploit.

  • Permadeath - Any crewman is replaceable, but you live and die with your station.

Join us on Discord!
https://discord.gg/TWWTyvJc6j
